org.jpacman.framework.ui

Interface IKeyboardEvents

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IButtonEvents
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PacmanInteraction

    public interface IKeyboardEvents
extends IButtonEvents
    The high level events that can occur in Pacman, and that can be triggered via keyboard shortcuts.
    Author:
    Arie van Deursen, TU Delft, Feb 4, 2012

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void down()
      Move the player one down.
      void left()
      Move the player one to the left.
      void right()
      Move the player on to the right.
      void up()
      Move the player one up.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jpacman.framework.ui.IButtonEvents

        exit, start, stop
